td.content: s:patient presents with Body Aches. pt is a female registrar aged 62 years. patient has a history of excessive levels of alcohol consumption she has smoked two packs of cigarettes a day since 4 years o:Height 70 in, Weight 106 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 16 a:Rheumatoid Arthritis p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed ibuprofen - 800 mg up to 3x day, and ordered ESR.

td.content: s:pt presents with Heart for 3 weeks. she has a history of Bradycardia for past 3 years. patient is a 63 year old white female registrar. pt has a history of excessive levels of alcohol consumption she has smoked two pack a day for 2 years o:Height 69 in, Weight 103 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 15 a:Bradycardia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to cardiology.

td.content: s:patient c/o 4 weeks h/o Heart. NKDA. patient is a female registrar aged 63 yrs. she drinks alcohol heavily for the past 4 years she has a 2 pack/day history of smoking for 4 years o:Height 70 in, Weight 105 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16 a:Bradycardia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed atropine - 1 mg IV every 5 minutes as needed for symptomatic bradyarrhythmia, and ordered single-chamber atrial pacemaker - heart.

Value.Value: ordered single - chamber atrial pacemaker - heart

td.content: s:pt with C/O Heart for 12 days that is frequent. pt is a 63 year old white female registrar. she drinks alcohol heavily for the past 4 years she smokes approx. 40 cigarettes daily for past 4 years o:Height 70 in, Weight 105 lbs, Temperature 99.2 F, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17, ECG ST elevation in leads V1, V2, V3, Inversion of T wave a:Bradycardia p:administered atropine - 1 mg IV every 5 minutes as needed for symptomatic bradyarrhythmia, performed ECG, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

s:pt complains of Body Aches for 9 days. NKDA. she is a 63 year old F registrar. o:Height 70 in, Weight 106 lbs, Temperature 99.3 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17 a:Rheumatoid Arthritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed acetaminophen - 650 mg up to 4x day, and ordered ESR.
